basic.blooming: Flowering period May-August, flowering period August-September
basic.color: Flower color white or light purple

maintenance.soil: Slightly alkaline soil with loose texture or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Like lower light, grows in places with scattered light or shade properly
maintenance.watering: Likes wet environments, water thoroughly when soil is dry, avoid saturated water
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 1-2 times monthly
maintenance.pruning: Remove aged tissues, dead, rotten, diseased leaves timely
